    • Method Detail

      • resolveUri

        public static URI resolveUri(URI base,
                             String path)
                      throws URISyntaxException
        Resolves a path against given URI and creates the resolved URI. (i.e. base = "http://localhost" ; path = "/path/to/file" ; resolved = "http://localhost/path/to/file") Handles all cases: if base already has a path, if path is relative, if path is absolute.
        Parameters:
        base - The base URI which the given path will be resolved against.
        path - The path to be resolved against the given URI
        Returns:
        resolved URI.
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException
